overview: Yuan Sen, an introverted and introverted character who died in her father's life, committed suicide as a result of her mother and her adulterous indignation. On the 1st Yuan Sen was forced to give birth to her younger brother Ah Hong Tuo. After the claw-like beast attacked his father and died mysteriously, Yuan Sen decided to return to Hong Kong to investigate the truth.
title: 幽灵魔影
